question: [S] I'm 63 and I had a car accident 1 year ago while a was driving a lorry for my company on the A1. Personal Independence Payment (PIP) is a tax-free benefit for people aged 16 or over who have not reached State Pension age. It can help with the extra costs caused by long term ill-health or a disability.

• an accident at work

question: [S] My friend is planning to build a new home . He wants to invest in a sewage system for domestic use that releases the sewage to surface water. The expected amount of discharge is 7,000 litres per day [Q] What are the general binding rules that he need to follow for a new septic tank?
